ublock.name: uBlock Origin
ublock.description: uBlock Origin is not just an “ad blocker“, it's a wide-spectrum content blocker with CPU and memory efficiency as a primary feature.

premid.name: PreMiD
premid.description: PreMiD is a simple, configurable utility that allows you to show what you're doing on the web in your Discord now playing status / Discord Rich Presence

stylus.name: Stylus
stylus.description: Redesign the web with Stylus, a user styles manager. Stylus allows you to easily install themes and skins for many popular sites.

user-js-css-and-js.name: User JavaScript and CSS
user-js-css-and-js.description: Userscript's and userstyle's — simple extension to inject your own JavaScript or CSS rules into any page. Features include instant execution, custom libraries, URL masking and live CSS. Documentation: https://tenrabbits.github.io/user-js-css-docs/

fallback.description: No description available. Create a GitHub issue to get this extension supported.
